headline: Launch HN: Stickerkeen – Easiest way to create, manage and send merch anywhere
description:
Happy to launch @stickerkeen - easiest way to create, manage and send merch/swags anywhere.

Join our waitlist here and get some of our awesome swags when we launch: https://stickerkeen.com

https://twitter.com/saintmalik_/status/1484856410793984004
headline_zh-Hans: 推出HN：Stickerkeen - 最简单的方式来创建、管理和发送任何地方的商品
